greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of proper divisors of n that are either of the form 6*k+1 or 6*k + 5.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(n) = A035218(n) - ch15(n), where ch15 is the characteristic function of numbers of the form +-1 mod 6, i.e., ch15(n) = A232991(n-1).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 03 2018
